key_takeaways: Solution: Mind adjusts after two minutes to naturally read and watch simultaneously (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Creators making content around existing IP to drive engagement back to original platform (Channel: viral)
Strategy: Creative Commons Zero (CC0) for IP - open sourcing intellectual property
